relnotes.name: SWITools

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Core Delivery
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.

deliverystep.name: EC062: Harmonise Security and SymbianSigned PC Tools libraries

relnotes.deliverystep: Refactoring makesis, signsis, dumpsis and interpretsis into libraries so that the code duplication can be avoided. This will also improve the maintenance of the code.

defect.title: Some security pc-tools do not display the Open SSL copyright notice

relnotes.defect: Security pc tools displays openssl copyright notice.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: The signing diagnosis pc tools are split from SWI component into a new component security_switools.
